columns.description: Local date of the scheduled game (YYYY-MM-DD).
columns.name: game_date

columns.description: StatsAPI game primary key for the contest.
columns.name: game_pk

columns.description: True if this team won the game.
columns.name: is_win

columns.description: MLBAM identifier for the opposing team.
columns.name: opponent_id

columns.description: Runs allowed by this team in the game.
columns.name: runs_against

columns.description: Runs scored by this team in the game.
columns.name: runs_for

columns.description: MLBAM identifier for the team represented on this row.
columns.name: team_id

columns.description: True if an inherited runner scored against this team (RFI flag from StatsAPI).
columns.name: was_rfi_scored

description: One row per team per game from the StatsAPI game log, capturing the opponent, runs scored/allowed, win flag, and whether inherited runners scored.
name: Team Game Logs
